name: Bockhampton Scott Tournament (BadGroupRequest)
description:
This game was made for the 2020 University of Portsmouth GameJam by Alex Carter (team 400-BadGroupRequest). 

DISCLAIMER: The art assets used in this game are not my own, but Royalty free assets from Google Poly. The plant chipper/shredder was made by another team's member from the team 'Shrinkwrap'. 

Cheeky plug: 

Please Check out Roller Castle (it's free on Android and IOS), a game made by my co-founded game development studio, Spectrolite Studio.  https://spectrolitestudio.co.uk/games/roller-castle/
